author: Bloomberg News
title: Canada’s AAA credit rating on the line as oil crash slams debt-loaded provinces
description: Provinces are likely to need more assistance from the federal government — which could trigger a downgrade
content:
Canada’s stellar credit rating is being put to the test as the oil crash and recession expose the country’s weak link: its provinces.
Among the Group of Seven countries, only Germany and Canada have AAA ratings from S&P Global Ratings. But as pressure ri… [+4769 chars]
